name: FR1
description: A Project should have a Title and a Description.

name: FR2
description: Each Project should contain a number of Tasks.

name: FR3
description: Each Project should involve a number of People.

name: FR4
description: Each Task should have a Title, a Start month, and a Duration (as in number of months).

name: FR5
description: Each Task shall contain a number of Efforts.

name: FR6
description: Each Person should have a Name.

name: FR7
description: Each Effort should have a Person responsible for this, and should have a Percentage (in integer).
